Class BookAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BookAdapter.BookViewHolder>
      • com.example.cmput301w19t15.Objects.BookAdapter

  • public class BookAdapter
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<BookAdapter.BookViewHolder>
    this class is to construct an adapter in order to display a list of book //* @param "mContext the context that we will work on to call this adapter //* @param "mBookList ArrayList of the books, which will be displayed by this adapter
    See Also:
    BookInfo, Book, FindBooks, MyBooks
